forum.name: progress of a hobbo
forum.description: some way of letting you guys know i'm not just doing nothing.
forum.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

thread.title: progress on 'sheild of supremacy'

comments.text: on it's first stage currently. might work on the whole 'ear clipping' thing but im not too worried since i am an elemental after all.
plans for 2nd stage are done with room for fine tuning. 3rd stage needs more work but is also technically done.
4th stage planns are funkin cool but i need more practice with commands to pull it off.
sheild will stay as it is as i move onto the 'thousand loop', will plan to write up my ideas on what it would have done though.

thread.latestCommentText: sheild will stay as it is as i move onto the 'thousand loop', will plan to write up my ideas on what it would have done though.
